data.title: Reviewing NGINX Fundamentals
data.desciption: Exploring the many features of NGINX and how to use them including load balancing in all forms, traffic management, content caching, and automation.
data.content:
### NGINX

- It is the leading web server and reverse proxy server for high-performance websites.
- It is so capable for caching that it is widely used by major content distribution networks (CDNs) at the core of their architecture.
